entry.name: Email_Critical_System_Logs
entry.description: Email Critical System Logs

entry.name: Hosts Visiting Malicious Sites
entry.caption: Hosts Visiting Malicious Sites
entry.query: (category eq command-and-control) or (category eq malware) or (category eq phishing)
entry.description: Categories C2, Malware, and Phishing

entry.name: Hosts Visiting Threat Cats
entry.caption: Hosts Visiting Threat Cats
entry.query: (category eq dynamic-dns) or (category eq parked) or (category eq unknown)
entry.description: Categories DynDNS, Parked, Unknown

entry.name: Hosts Visiting Risky Sites
entry.caption: Hosts Visiting Risky Sites
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and ((category eq dynamic-dns) or (category eq parked) or (category eq unknown))
entry.description: Categories DynDNS, Parked, Unknown

entry.name: WildFire Malicious Verdicts
entry.caption: WildFire Malicious Verdicts
entry.query: (verdict eq malicious) or (verdict eq phishing)
entry.description: Malicious or Phishing Wildfire Submissions

entry.name: WildFire verdicts SMTP
entry.caption: WildFire verdicts SMTP
entry.query: (app eq smtp)
entry.description: Wildfire submissions w app-id eq smtp

entry.name: Clients sinkholed
entry.caption: Clients sinkholed
entry.description: Clients hitting sinkhole addresses

entry.name: Used Rules
entry.caption: Used Rules
entry.query: (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: All Rules Being Used

entry.name: Inbound Non-Working-Traffic
entry.caption: Inbound Non-Working-Traffic
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and ((app eq incomplete) or (app eq insufficient-data) or (app eq not-applicable) or (action eq deny) or (action eq drop))
entry.description: Optional: What is trying to access internal servers. Not scheduled.

entry.name: Inbound Used Rules
entry.caption: Inbound Used Rules
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Inbound Rules Being Used

entry.name: Inbound Traffic - All
entry.caption: Inbound Traffic - All
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: All Traffic source from Internet (used for determining amount of SSL traffic by dividing bytes from this rule in Inbound traffic SSL)

entry.name: Inbound Traffic - SSL
entry.caption: Inbound Traffic - SSL
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app eq ssl)
entry.description: All SSL Traffic sourced from Internet (used for determining amount of SSL traffic by dividing bytes from Inbound Traffic - All into this rule)

entry.name: Inbound Insufficient Data-Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Insufficient Data-Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app eq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Internet traffic where application not determined (insufficient-data, incomplete, or not-applicable)

entry.name: Inbound Rules wURL Filtering
entry.caption: Inbound Rules wURL Filtering
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Inbound Rules should not use URL Filtering

entry.name: Inbound File UPLD by Rule
entry.caption: Inbound File UPLD by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq client-to-server)
entry.description: Internet Clients Uploading Files to your network

entry.name: Inbound Source Countries
entry.caption: Inbound Source Countries
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Source Countries initiating successful connections

entry.name: Inbound Source Countries-App
entry.caption: Inbound Source Countries-App
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Source Countries initiating successful connections to your network and the Apps they are using

entry.name: Inbound Allowd Viruses
entry.caption: Inbound Allowd Viruses
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus))
entry.description: Viruses allow into your network from the Internet

entry.name: Inbound Denied Viruses
entry.caption: Inbound Denied Viruses
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus))
entry.description: Viruses successfully denied from entering your network

entry.name: Inbound Rules wThreat
entry.caption: Inbound Rules wThreat
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (severity geq medium)

entry.name: Inbound Rule Allow Threat-MHC
entry.caption: Inbound Rule Allow Threat-MHC
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and (severity geq medium)
entry.description: Threats geq Medium

entry.name: Inbound Rule Allow Threat-LI
entry.caption: Inbound Rule Allow Threat-LI
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and (severity leq low)
entry.description: Threats leq Low

entry.name: Inbound Brute Force by SRC IP
entry.caption: Inbound Brute Force by SRC IP
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (category-of-threatid eq brute-force)
entry.description: One to many category brute-force

entry.name: Inbound Brute Force by DST IP
entry.caption: Inbound Brute Force by DST IP
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (category-of-threatid eq brute-force)
entry.description: Many to one category brute-force

entry.name: Inbound FileTypes to WildFire
entry.caption: Inbound FileTypes to WildFire
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: File Types coming from the Internet that have an unknown verdict and are sent to WildFire

entry.name: Inbound Apps to WildFire
entry.caption: Inbound Apps to WildFire
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: File Types coming from the Internet that have an unknown verdict and are sent to WildFire

entry.name: Inbound Rules to WildFire
entry.caption: Inbound Rules to WildFire
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Internal Rules coming from-to internal that have an unknown verdict and are sent to WildFire

entry.name: Inbound Allowd Spyware Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Allowd Spyware Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (subtype eq spyware) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and (severity geq medium )
entry.description: Spyware allowed in from the Internet

entry.name: Inbound Denied Spyware Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Denied Spyware Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (subtype eq spyware) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Spyware successfully blocked from entering your network

entry.name: Inbound Allowd Vuln C2S Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Allowd Vuln C2S Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq client-to-server) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and (category-of-threatid neq brute-force) and (severity geq medium)
entry.description: Client on the Internet sending traffic to your network intended to exploit a vulnerability on your network.

entry.name: Inbound Denied Vuln C2S Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Denied Vuln C2S Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq client-to-server) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and (category-of-threatid neq brute-force)
entry.description: Vulnerabilties successfully denied from entering your network where traffic initiated external, attacker external

entry.name: Inbound Allowd Vuln S2C Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Allowd Vuln S2C Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and (category-of-threatid neq brute-force) and (severity geq medium)
entry.description: Inbound Allowed Server-to-Client traffic where threat log type is classified - vulnerability

entry.name: Inbound Denied Vuln S2C Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Denied Vuln S2C Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and (category-of-threatid neq brute-force)
entry.description: Vulnerabilties successfully denied from entering your network where traffic initiated external, attacker internal

entry.name: Inbound URLs by Rule
entry.caption: Inbound URLs by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq continue) or (action eq override))
entry.description: Internal rules should not have URL filtering applied.

entry.name: Inbound Apps
entry.caption: Inbound Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Traffic allowed inbound where application is classified - incomplete, not-applicable, or insufficient-data

entry.name: Inbound Apps-IPs
entry.caption: Inbound Apps-IPs
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Traffic allowed inbound where application is classified - incomplete, not-applicable, or insufficient-data - Source IP

entry.name: Inbound Apps-Ports
entry.caption: Inbound Apps-Ports
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Traffic allowed inbound where application is classified - incomplete, not-applicable, or insufficient-data - Destination Port

entry.name: Inbound Apps-Location
entry.caption: Inbound Apps-Location
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Traffic allowed inbound where application is classified - incomplete, not-applicable, or insufficient-data - Source Country

entry.name: Inbound Unknown Apps
entry.caption: Inbound Unknown Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and ((app eq unknown-tcp) or (app eq unknown-udp) or ( app eq unknown-p2p)) and (action eq allow)
entry.description: Traffic allowed inbound where application is classified - incomplete, not-applicable, or insufficient-data

entry.name: Inbound File DNLD by Rule
entry.caption: Inbound File DNLD by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (direction eq server-to-client)
entry.description: Internet Clients Downloading Files from your network

entry.name: Inbound File DNLD by RuleDetail
entry.caption: Inbound File DNLD by RuleDetail
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (srcloc neq 'US')
entry.description: Internet Clients Downloading Files from your network

entry.name: Internal Used Rules
entry.caption: Internal Used Rules
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Rules being used by traffic sourced from Internal going to Internal

entry.name: Internal Rules wURL Filtering
entry.caption: Internal Rules wURL Filtering
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Internal Rules should not use URL Filtering

entry.name: Internal Rules wURL-Detail
entry.caption: Internal Rules wURL-Detail
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Internal Rules should not use URL Filtering

entry.name: Internal File UPLD by Rule
entry.caption: Internal File UPLD by Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (action eq alert) and (direction eq client-to-server)
entry.description: Internal Clients Uploading Files to your network

entry.name: Internal Allowd Viruses
entry.caption: Internal Allowd Viruses
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus)) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))
entry.description: Viruses allowed where source and dest are inside your network

entry.name: All Allowd Viruses
entry.caption: All Allowd Viruses
entry.query: ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus)) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))

entry.name: All Viruses
entry.caption: All Viruses
entry.query: ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus))
entry.description: Virus or Wildfire Virus detected - deny or allow

entry.name: Internal Denied Viruses
entry.caption: Internal Denied Viruses
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and ((action eq alert) or (action neq allow)) and ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus))
entry.description: Viruses successfully blocked from inside your network

entry.name: Internal Rules wThreat
entry.caption: Internal Rules wThreat
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and ((direction eq server-to-client) or (direction eq client-to-server)) and (severity geq medium)
entry.description: Internal threats by Rule

entry.name: Internal Brute Force by SRC IP
entry.caption: Internal Brute Force by SRC IP
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and ((direction eq server-to-client) or (direction eq client-to-server)) and (category-of-threatid eq brute-force)
entry.description: One to many category brute-force

entry.name: Internal Brute Force by DST IP
entry.caption: Internal Brute Force by DST IP
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and ((direction eq server-to-client) or (direction eq client-to-server)) and (category-of-threatid eq brute-force)
entry.description: Many to one category brute-force

entry.name: Internal FileTypes to WildFire
entry.caption: Internal FileTypes to WildFire

system.login-banner: You have accessed a protected system. Log off immediately if you are not an authorized user.

entry.name: Outbound Block Rule
entry.description: Block outbound sessions with destination address matching one of the Palo Alto Networks external dynamic lists for high risk and known malicious IP addresses.

entry.name: Inbound Block Rule
entry.description: Block inbound sessions with source address matching one of the Palo Alto Networks external dynamic lists for high risk and known malicious IP addresses.

entry.name: DNS Sinkhole Block
entry.description: Block outbound sessions that match a malicious domain and have been redirected to a configured sinkhole IP address.

entry.name: Outbound Bogon Block Rule
entry.description: Block outbound sessions with a destination address matching a known bogon address that should not be transitting the firewall. Add known exceptions to the rule before activating.

entry.name: Inbound Bogon Block Rule
entry.description: Block inbound sessions with a source address matching a known bogon address that should not be transitting the firewall. Add known exceptions to the rule before activating.

entry.name: NO-Decrypt URL Categories
entry.description: This rule does not do Decryption. This rule is validating SSL Protocol Communications.

entry.name: NO-Decrypt Rule
entry.description: This rule does not do Decryption. This rule is validating SSL Protocol Communications.
